entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:57 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 09:57 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: E 17 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
